heading: foul play?
subheading: the investigation into the crash of egyptair flight 990 has been turned over to the fbi after an examination of the jet's voice recorder turned up evidence of a "criminal act." according to news accounts, a voice in the cockpit began making religious remarks about death just before the plane went into its steep dive that resulted in the crash and the deaths of 217 people. based on evidence already collected, experts are discounting a mechanical failure of the aircraft.
author: wired staff
text: the investigation into the crash of egyptair flight 990 has been turned over to the fbi after an examination of the jet's voice recorder turned up evidence of a "criminal act." according to news accounts, a voice in the cockpit began making religious remarks about death just before the plane went into its steep dive that resulted in the crash and the deaths of 217 people. based on evidence already collected, experts are discounting a mechanical failure of the aircraft.
